item.description:
I apologize to everyone for changing the details of the event with only a half week notice but another member of the group as informed me that there is a top roping competition at Metro Rock this Sunday. It isn't listed on their website but I did confirm it by going to http://www.usaclimbin.... This is a good opportunity to check out another gym and since Boston Rock Gym is relatively close, let's give it a shot there. For directions go to www.bostonrockgym.com. The time will still be 11 AM. I hope to see everyone there!

If you haven't climbed with us before, you can look for me (Mike). I am 6'4" and I will be wearing a t-shirt and tan shorts. If you would like my cell number in case you don't think you will be able to find me, please send me an email.
item.name: Weekly Sunday Climb
